gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 119, Pistons 94
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics win their sixth game in a row as they defeat the Pistons, 119-94. Jaylen Brown recorded a game-high 31 points, along with seven rebounds and three assists for the Celtics, while Derrick White added 22 points (6-12 3pt. FG), 10 rebounds and 10 assists in the victory, the first triple-double of his career. Jaden Ivey tallied 21 points, five rebounds and five assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 54-14 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 12-56.
